meanings.definition: The quality of being bold or confident.
meanings.sent1: Her forwardnesses in speaking up during the meeting impressed everyone.
meanings.sent2: His forwardnesses in approaching new challenges always paid off.
meanings.sent3: The cat's forwardnesses in trying to catch the laser pointer entertained the whole family.
meanings.sent4: The athlete's forwardnesses on the field were like a lion hunting its prey.
meanings.sent5: The child's forwardnesses in asking questions made the teacher smile.

meanings.definition: The state of being eager or willing to do something.
meanings.sent1: Their forwardnesses to help their friend in need showed true friendship.
meanings.sent2: The team's forwardnesses to learn new techniques led to their success.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's forwardnesses to play fetch made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her forwardnesses to explore the unknown were like a sailor setting sail to new lands.
meanings.sent5: The student's forwardnesses to participate in class discussions were commendable.

meanings.definition: The act of moving or progressing in a particular direction.
meanings.sent1: The forwardnesses of the train towards the city signaled the start of the journey.
meanings.sent2: The forwardnesses of the river carried the leaves downstream.
meanings.sent3: The forwardnesses of the ants towards the picnic attracted attention.
meanings.sent4: The forwardnesses of time never cease, always pushing us forward.
meanings.sent5: The forwardnesses of the clouds across the sky painted a beautiful scene.
